title: Designing and Facilitating AI-Based Mathematics Learning Processes

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening mathematical problem-solving competencies using AI tools in real-world work settings for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized math problem-solving strategies with AI tools at over 80% accuracy.
Learners can present three or more case studies of solving complex math problems through knowledge community activities with teammates on an AI-based collaborative platform.
Learners can create organization-level math learning roadmaps by applying the principle of knowledge integration across micro-, meso-, and macro-learning levels.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
